message: Let's split fairly, I get a bit more
I'm feeling generous Alice, but let's make it a bit more even this time.
Come on Bob, be realistic, I'm being generous
Alice, let's stop wasting time. 50/50 is the fairest deal. Take it or leave it.
You're running out of time, Bob. My patience is wearing thin
Time is money Alice, and we're both losing out. I'm bumping my offer slightly, but this is my final concession.
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'll take a bit more, thanks
